thread.title: Birmingham police body cameras bring drop in use of force, citizen complaints
thread.title_full: Birmingham police body cameras bring drop in use of force, citizen complaints

title: Birmingham police body cameras bring drop in use of force, citizen complaints
text:
15 Birmingham police body cameras bring drop in use of force, citizen complaints 
AL.com: The use of body cameras on Birmingham police has led to a dramatic drop in citizen complaints against officers, as well as a decline in use of force incidents, in the past two months, authorities said.
